name: Atal Bhujal Yojana
region: Gujarat, Haryana, Karnataka, Madhya Pradesh, Maharashtra, Rajasthan, Uttar Pradesh
goal: Promote sustainable groundwater management involving community participation.

name: Namami Gange Programme
region: Uttarakhand, Uttar Pradesh, Bihar, Jharkhand, West Bengal
goal: Rejuvenation of the River Ganga and its tributaries through pollution abatement and conservation measures.
